actions.name: Acid Splash
actions.description: Hurl a bubble of acid that damages each creature it hits.

actions.name: Bone Chill
actions.description: Prevent the target from healing until your next turn. An undead target receives Disadvantage on Attack Rolls.

actions.name: Charm Person
actions.description: Charm a humanoid to prevent it from attacking you. You gain Advantage on Charisma Checks in dialogue.

actions.name: Colour Spray
actions.description: Blind creatures up to a combined 33 Hit Points.

actions.name: Expeditious Retreat
actions.description: Gain Dash as a bonus action.

actions.name: False Life
actions.description: Bolster yourself with a necromantic facsimile of life, gaining 1d4+4 Temporary Hit Points.

actions.name: Feather Fall
actions.description: You and nearby allies gain Immunity to falling damage.

actions.name: Fog Cloud
actions.description: Create a cloud of dense fog that Heavily Obscures and Blinds creatures within.

actions.name: Ice Knife
actions.description: Throw a shard of ice that deals 1d10 Piercing damage. It then explodes, dealing 2d6 Cold damage to anyone nearby.

actions.name: Longstrider
actions.description: Increase a creature's Movement Speed by 3m.

actions.name: Protection from Evil and Good
actions.description: Protect an ally against aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead.

actions.name: Ray of Sickness
actions.description: Call forth a ray of nauseating, greenish energy. Deals 2d8 Poison damage and possibly Poisons the target.

actions.name: Tasha's Hideous Laughter
actions.description: Leave a creature Prone with laughter, unable to get up.

actions.name: Heroism
actions.description: The creature can't be Frightened and gains 5 Temporary Hit Points at the start of each turn.

actions.name: Wrathful Smite
actions.description: Your next attack deals an additional 1d6 Psychic damage and possibly Frightens the target.

actions.name: Searing Smite
actions.description: Your next attack deals an additional 1d6 Fire damage and sets the target on fire.

actions.name: Compelled Duel
actions.description: Compel an enemy to only attack you. It has Disadvantage on attacks against other targets.

actions.name: Entangle
actions.description: Vines sprout from the ground, turning the area into Difficult Terrain and possibly Restraining creatures.

actions.name: Goodberry
actions.description: Conjure 10 berries infused with healing magic. Each berry heals 1 HP.

actions.name: Detect Magic
actions.description: Gain the ability to detect enchanted creatures and objects.

actions.name: Disguise Self
actions.description: Magically change all aspects of your appearance.

actions.name: Animal Friendship
actions.description: Convince a beast that you mean it no harm.

actions.name: Speak with Animals
actions.description: Gain the ability to comprehend and communicate with beasts.

actions.name: Blindness
actions.description: Limit a foe's sight range. Attack Rolls against it have Advantage. Its own Attack Rolls have Disadvantage.

actions.name: Crown of Madness
actions.description: Instil madness in a humanoid enemy, making them attack the nearest creature.

actions.name: Darkvision
actions.description: Grant a creature the ability to see in the dark out to a range of 12m.

actions.name: Enlarge/Reduce
actions.description: Make a creature larger or smaller. Enlarge grants Advantage on Strength Checks, +1d4 damage. Reduce grants Disadvantage on Strength Checks, -1d4 damage.

actions.name: Gust of Wind
actions.description: Create a blast of wind that pushes creatures 5m and disperses gas or vapour.

actions.name: Knock
actions.description: Unlock an object that is held shut by a mundane lock.

actions.name: Phantasmal Force
actions.description: Deal 1d6 Psychic damage per turn to a creature. It believes the illusion is real.

actions.name: Ray of Enfeeblement
actions.description: The target only deals half damage with weapon attacks that use Strength.

actions.name: See Invisibility
actions.description: You can see Invisible creatures, and can see into the Ethereal Plane.

actions.name: Aid
actions.description: Bolster your allies with toughness and resolve, increasing their Hit Point maximum and current Hit Points by 5.

actions.name: Barkskin
actions.description: The target's AC can't be less than 16.

actions.name: Calm Emotions
actions.description: Suppress strong emotions to end Charmed and Frightened conditions, or make hostile creatures indifferent.

actions.name: Magic Weapon
actions.description: Infuse a weapon with arcane energy. It becomes a +1 magic weapon.

actions.name: Prayer of Healing
actions.description: Heal all allies for 2d8 + spellcasting modifier.

actions.name: Protection from Poison
actions.description: Touch a creature to neutralize poison and grant advantage on saving throws against being Poisoned.

actions.name: Warding Bond
actions.description: Ward an ally: increases its AC by 1 and Saving Throws by 1. Each time it takes damage, you take the same amount.

actions.name: Animate Dead
actions.description: Create an undead servant from a corpse.

actions.name: Blink
actions.description: At the end of each turn, roll a d20. On 11 or higher, you vanish to the Ethereal Plane until the start of your next turn.

actions.name: Fear
actions.description: Project a phantasmal image of a creature's worst fears, causing targets to become Frightened and drop everything they're holding.

actions.name: Feign Death
actions.description: Put an ally into a magical coma that mimics death. They become resistant to all damage except Psychic.

actions.name: Fly
actions.description: Grant a creature the ability to Fly.

actions.name: Gaseous Form
actions.description: Transform into a tiny gas cloud that can't be harmed. Can slip through small openings.

actions.name: Glyph of Warding
actions.description: Inscribe a circle of arcane glyphs on the ground that triggers when entered by an enemy.

actions.name: Protection from Energy
actions.description: Touch a creature to grant it Resistance to Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder damage.

actions.name: Remove Curse
actions.description: Touch a creature or object to end all Curses affecting it.

actions.name: Stinking Cloud
actions.description: Create a cloud of gas so nauseating it prevents creatures within from taking Actions.

actions.name: Vampiric Touch
actions.description: Deal 3d6 Necrotic damage and regain Hit Points equal to half the damage dealt.

actions.name: Conjure Barrage
actions.description: Hurl an arc of spectral weapons at all enemies in a 60-foot cone.

actions.name: Crusader's Mantle
actions.description: Radiate a 30ft aura that bolsters allies with extra damage: +1d4 Radiant.

actions.name: Daylight
actions.description: Enchant an item to emanate a 60-foot sunlight sphere.

actions.name: Blinding Smite
actions.description: Your next attack deals +3d8 Radiant and possibly Blinds the target.

actions.name: Elemental Weapon
actions.description: Infuse a weapon with elemental power. +1 to attack rolls and +1d4 elemental damage.

actions.name: Plant Growth
actions.description: Make weeds and vines erupt from the ground, turning it into Difficult Terrain.

actions.name: Sleet Storm
actions.description: Call forth a storm of ice that turns the ground into Difficult Terrain. Creatures inside can slip and fall Prone.

actions.name: Water Walk
actions.description: Grant the ability to walk on liquid surfaces.

actions.name: Confusion
actions.description: Befuddle a group of creatures, causing them to attack random targets, wander aimlessly, or stand dazed.

actions.name: Fire Shield
actions.description: Surround yourself in flames that grant Resistance to Cold or Fire, and deal 2d8 damage when hit in melee.

actions.name: Phantasmal Killer
actions.description: Tap into a creature's nightmares to haunt it with a vision that deals 4d10 Psychic damage each turn.

actions.name: Evard's Black Tentacles
actions.description: Conjure dark tendrils from the ground that deal 3d6 Bludgeoning damage and Restrain creatures.

actions.name: Freedom of Movement
actions.description: The target can't be Paralysed, Restrained, or slowed by Difficult Terrain.

actions.name: Death Ward
actions.description: Protect a creature against death. The next time damage would reduce it to 0 Hit Points, it drops to 1 Hit Point instead.

actions.name: Guardian of Faith
actions.description: Call forth a divine guardian that deals 20 Radiant damage to any hostile creature that enters its range.

actions.name: Otiluke's Resilient Sphere
actions.description: Encase a creature in an arcane, shimmering sphere. It can't be damaged by anything outside the sphere.

actions.name: Staggering Smite
actions.description: Your next attack deals +4d6 Psychic damage. On a hit, the target may be Stunned.

actions.name: Dominate Person
actions.description: Make a humanoid fight alongside you. The target has Advantage on Saving Throws when it takes damage.

actions.name: Telekinesis
actions.description: Manipulate a creature or object with the power of your mind.

actions.name: Greater Restoration
actions.description: Touch a creature and remove Charmed, Petrified, Cursed, or reduced ability scores.

actions.name: Raise Dead
actions.description: Bring an ally back to life with 1 Hit Point.

actions.name: Contagion
actions.description: Touch a creature and inflict a disease upon it.

actions.name: Arcane Gate
actions.description: Create two linked teleportation portals.

actions.name: Circle of Death
actions.description: A sphere of negative energy expands from a point, dealing 8d6 Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Eyebite
actions.description: Your eyes become voids of power. Each turn, target a creature for: Sleep, Panic, or Sickened effects.

actions.name: Wall of Ice
actions.description: Raise a wall of ice that blocks movement. Breaking through deals 10d6 Cold damage.

actions.name: Harm
actions.description: Unleash a virulent disease on a creature. Deals 14d6 Necrotic damage. Can't reduce target below 1 HP.

actions.name: Create Undead
actions.description: Raise a corpse as a Ghoul that follows and fights for you.

actions.name: Dispel Magic
actions.description: End a magical effect or remove a spell.

actions.name: Spirit Guardians
actions.description: Call forth spirits that deal 3d8 Radiant damage to enemies within 15 feet.

actions.name: Branding Smite
actions.description: Your next attack deals +2d6 Radiant and possibly marks the target, preventing invisibility.

actions.name: Misty Step
actions.description: Surrounded by silver mist, you teleport to an unoccupied space you can see.
